meanings.definition: Covered in or characterized by dust.
meanings.sent1: The old attic had a dusty and dustiness smell.
meanings.sent2: The furniture in the abandoned house was covered in dustiness.
meanings.sent3: The dusty old bookshelf added a touch of dustiness to the room.
meanings.sent4: The car's neglected interior showed signs of dustiness.
meanings.sent5: The neglected garden had a layer of dustiness on every surface.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being dusty.
meanings.sent1: After cleaning the room, the dustiness was finally gone.
meanings.sent2: The old house had a noticeable dustiness that made it feel abandoned.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful antics kicked up a cloud of dustiness in the room.
meanings.sent4: The attic's dustiness seemed to settle on everything stored there.
meanings.sent5: The dustiness of the desert made it hard to see far into the distance.
